document_data.title: Desperately Seeking Selûne
document_data.mainbody: '''''Desperately Seeking Selûne''''' is an adventure in the [[Living City]] organized play campaign for 2{{nd}} edition {{dnd}} published in 1999. Written by [[Chris Ruester]], it is the finale of the ''Red Threats'' series and features two rounds in total; one per difficulty level. Each of the rounds is separately labeled as a chapter,{{Cite organized play/LC/Desperately Seeking Selûne|1}} with their events taking place concurrently with one another.<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/Desperately Seeking Selûne|3,11,32-33}}<ref group="note" name="Hereditary">''Another Rescue'' involves players tracking down and rescuing the kidnapped [[Selûnite]] [[Tessa Saar]]. ''Dealing With Darkness'' has players tracking down and recovering the stolen ''Orb of Selûne''. Both thefts happen on the day of the [[Midsummer’s Festival]]. At the end of ''Another Rescue'', players return home to learn that while they were gone "...great adventurers found and returned the ''Orb of Selûne''."
